document_data.mainbody:
Aryvindaire was a trader and a leader of a wood elven band that resided within the Neverwinter Wood in the late 14 century DR.
Aryvindaire and the group of elves were proficient at stealthily moving across the Neverwinter Wood trees unnoticed, ready to riddle their enemies with arrows at a moments notice. Aryvindaire was a confident elf who spoke with a melodic voice with a noticeable wood-elven accent.
Aryvindaires elves all wore boots of elvenkind. Some of the items sold by Aryvindaire to allies of the group included elven chainmail, shederran longbows, a composite longbow of deadly precision and of precision,  amulets of natural armor, cloaks of elvenkind, stones of alarm, a ring of the wood elves, and a selection of enchanted arrows and potions.
Circa the , Aryvindaire elven band could be found  amidst the trees of Neverwinter Wood on the Neverwinter Rivers eastern bank. They warned strangers that they were not welcomed in that part of the wood however, if the invaders proved to be allies, elves, or individuals knowledgeable of wood elven culture and language, Aryvindaire offered to trade for the groups valuable elvish goods.
